explains: 【名】 （Brink）（英、德、荷、丹、瑞典）布林克（人名）
wordGroup: on the brink of 濒于，濒临；在…的边缘

sentences.en: He was driven to the brink of madness.
sentences.cn: 他被逼到了疯狂的边缘。

sentences.en: Civilization is on the brink of apocalypse.
sentences.cn: 文明已濒临毁灭的边缘。

sentences.en: The church seems to be on the brink of schism.
sentences.cn: 该教会看来处于分裂的边缘。
